title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 327.7 - Decision
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 327.7 - Decision

State Regulations

The decision of two members of the hospital arbitration
committee shall constitute the decision of the committee and shall be binding
upon the parties; and if only two members are present at the time and place of
hearing, their joint decision shall constitute the decision of the
committee. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
327.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
